message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.MM

The paper deals with video action recognition using natural language descriptions, which involves computer vision (CV) and natural language processing (NLP) techniques. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) and cs.CL (Computation and Language) are the most likely sub-categories. Additionally, the paper proposes a framework that uses a grammar to guide the activity-recognition process, which involves artificial intelligence (AI) techniques. Hence, cs.AI is also a likely sub-category. The paper also demonstrates the utility and expressiveness of the proposed framework, which involves machine learning (ML) techniques. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is another likely sub-category. Finally, the paper deals with multi-activity videos, which involves multimedia (MM) techniques. Hence, cs.MM (Multimedia) is also a likely sub-category.
